pt_BR {
    LocaleID { "0416" }
    LocaleString { "pt_BR" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.##;-\u00A4 #,##0.##",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "BRA" }
    localPatternChars { "GyMdkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "HH'h'mm'min'ss's' z",
                    "H'h'm'min's's' z",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm",
                    "EEEE, d' de 'MMMM' de 'yyyy",
                    "d' de 'MMMM' de 'yyyy",
                    "dd/MM/yyyy",
                    "dd/MM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
